content: this blossom crochet baby blanket is perfect for keeping your little one cozy and warm easy to make with basic skills this simple pattern allows for endless customization with your favorite yarn and colors whether for playtime nap time or cuddling your little one and you will fall in love with this soft and snuggly blanket it makes a lovely baby shower gift too details - pattern is written in standard us terms - basic knowledge of beginner stitches is needed to make this pattern - size of baby blanket is 36 inches x 36 inches materials - 1 ball of lion brand pound of love yarn in the color quartz weight 4/ 16oz 1 020yds you will need a total of 954 yards or you can use another worsted weight yarn - 1 ball of lion brand wool ease yarn in the color fisherman weight 4/3oz 197 yds you will need a total of 197 yards or you can use another worsted weight yarn - 5 0 mm h crochet hook - darning needle - 1 stitch marker - scissors
